definition: A term used to describe something that is tailored or customized according to specific preferences, needs, or characteristics of an individual. It is commonly used to refer to personalized or unique items, services, or experiences that are designed to cater to the specific requirements or tastes of a person.

examples.german: Die Kleidung kann individuell angepasst werden.
examples.english: The clothing can be customized individually.

examples.german: Jeder hat das Recht auf individuelle Entfaltung.
examples.english: Everyone has the right to individual development.
